alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 8:49AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of southwestern Woodford, northeastern Fulton, central Tazewell, northwestern McLean, north central Mason and central Peoria Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 847 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower over Glasford, or 8 miles west of Pekin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong shower will be near... Hanna City around 855 AM CDT. Pekin, Bartonville, Marquette Heights and Bellevue around 900 AM CDT. Peoria, Creve Coeur and West Peoria around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Morton, East Peoria, Washington, Germantown Hills, Spring Bay and Bay View Gardens. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 25 and 31. Interstate 474 between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 74 between mile markers 79 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford
